Articles.Content:
I'am trying to build a Dyna-Soar-like space plane on top of rocket, but my attempts came to halt. The reason is that it explodes as soon as it reach ~175 m/s.

By experimentation with different parts and configurations I came to conclusion that culprit part is Mark 1 Command pod. If I replace it with Mk-1 Command Pod everthing is fine.

Ok, Mark 1 can be weaker than Mk1 (after all it is just aircraft cabin), but I couln't find any hint in any documentation that it is intended behavior.

So, my questions are:

1. Did you ever encountered such behavior of Mark 1 Cabin?

2. Do you consider it to be a bug or feature?
U have any mods like Deadly reentry or FAR? What does you G meter say upon exploding? press f3 the next time this happens, and let us know what it says.

No deadly reentry or FAR.

"Most Gee Force" - 1.8G
Could it simply be under to much stress and just break off?
That's weird. My planes using this cockpit sometimes create plasma during flight - and yet there was no exploding cockpits.
OP have you tried adding extra struts as I have had cockpits snap off and cause the whole rocket to eat itself before now and extra struts do fix it (sad but true).
